body.name: Sakugi Corner Shower Caddy - 2 Pack, Adhesive Shower Organizers, Rustproof Stainless Steel Shower Shelves with 8 Hooks, No Drilling Bathroom Organizers and Storage Racks, Space-Saving, Black

features: EASY ACCESSIBILITY: No more searching for your favorite shampoo or struggling to find your razor. Sakugi 2-pack bathroom shelves with 8 hooks are designed to effectively organize your shower essentials within easy reach whenever you need them. Everything is neatly arranged and readily accessible on Sakugi, enjoying a convenient showering experience.

MAXIMIZE CORNER SPACE: This Sakugi innovative round-corner shower shelf for inside shower optimizes unused corner space, transforming it into practical storage areas. Say goodbye to wasted space and expensive renovations! Sakugi space-efficient black bathroom accessories are a simple and budget-friendly choice to meet your increasing storage needs.

STURDY & STABLE: Each shower caddy for corners is equipped with 2 ultra-powerful adhesive tapes capable of supporting up to 20lb, which ensures your corner shower caddy stays firmly in place, even when handling the shampoo. The Sakugi shower caddy for hanging provides a secure and stable storage solution for your shower necessities.

PREMIUM MATERIAL: The Sakugi shower rack is an ideal bathroom decor that combines style and functionality. Made of premium 304 stainless steel with a sleek black coating, it is waterproof, rustproof, scratch-resistant, and easy to clean. Moreover, the whole-body ventilation design allows quick water drainage, keeping your shower items clean and dry.

QUICK INSTALLATION: Sakugi wall-mounted corner shower racks offer a hassle-free and drill-free installation process while taking up minimal space. Simply follow the straightforward instructions, and you'll have your shower essentials neatly organized in no time. If you need to remove the shower shelf, heat the adhesive tape with a hair dryer and peel it off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stylish and Functional Shower Storage
reviews.reviewText: The Sakugi Corner Shower Caddy is a fantastic addition to my bathroom. The two-pack, adhesive design maximizes corner space, providing easy access to shower essentials. Its sturdy stainless steel construction, sleek black coating, and easy installation make it a stylish and functional choice. With no drilling required, this caddy offers a hassle-free solution for a tidy shower space. I highly recommend the Sakugi for its convenience and modern design.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attractive & efficient storage for shower items
reviews.reviewText: This shower caddy adds so much useable space! The attractive matte black finish easily goes with any decor. It’s fairly simple to install and really holds a lot of items. It’s well built and so far holds up to pretty heavy bottles etc. the bonus hooks are great for hanging shower poofs. Can’t imagine how I lived without it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like the way the shelves adhere to the tiles. The shelves are secure and are able to hold the bottles of soap and shampoo without me having to worry that they will fall down and break.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works Great and Easy to Install!
reviews.reviewText: Unfortunately, my shower only has one small storage area in it for shower items. We definitely needed more storage space. The other shower caddies I used had suction cups…they were always falling off the wall. So I decided to try out this caddy system.These caddies were so easy to put on the tile. The mounting system is very easy to apply. You can even slide the caddies off of the mount so you can clean/rinse off the caddies themselves. These definitely stay on the wall and aren’t going anywhere soon. The larger caddy has easily been holding two huge Costco-size bottles of shampoo and conditioner. Overall this caddy system keeps my shower nice and organized. It is so nice to not have all of my wife’s shower stuff sitting all over the ledge of the shower.I have been using these in my shower for quite some time and they are truly rust free. Overall I am very pleased with these shower caddies and the black matte color looks great too. I would definitely recommend this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The item arrived looking much smaller than the picture. Very flimsy doesn't hold any kind of weight

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It looks really good! My wall is not regular, so I cut the tape and use two for our shower sponge

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The adhesives are very strong! So make sure you get the placement right the 1st time because my bottom shelf is crooked and I couldn't fix it lol. Awesome product. Better than expected! Looks so pretty. Definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Such an easy and great way to be organised in the shower!
reviews.reviewText: I have tried shower caddies that are held up on the wall by suction cups, and they have always ended up losing suction, falling off, and disappointing me. So I ended up getting one that stands in the corner. While it was a little annoying because it was slightly off-balance (my shower floor is probably not completely flat), I still used it for over 5 years. But it has been looking worse for wear lately. And then I got a shower brush a few weeks ago and that came with a hook that was on a really sticky sticker for the shower wall. Which got me thinking...Someone I know ended up recommending this particular one to me. I really liked that this product includes 5 pieces and that they are rust-proof, can hold up to 12 lbs, and seem very easy to install. I was so excited when I finally received the product and immediately went to put up the stickers. The stickers seem really strong and I followed instructions to leave them on the wall for 24 hours before attaching the shelves to them. There are 4 variously-sized pieces, with 2 of the smallest piece. The variety in sizes/types actually worked really well for me and the items I wanted to keep in my shower.While I have had them up for less than a week, I am very happy with these shelves. I will come back to update my review if they end up disappointing me, but I am very optimistic about these lasting for a long time.
